data.title: COLD FOOD
data.text: ThIs by far one of the most upsetting buffet I have ever visited.Food was cold,and very very salty.Told waiter,simply ignored me.Last time I will ever eat here.

data.title: A Great Place for Lunch or Dinner
data.text: When eating in the Rio Grande Valley, cleanliness is a critical issue.  This restaurant has been receiving a 4-Star rating for at least three continuous years.  It means this restaurant has met or exceeded food quality standards.  Prices are reasonable.  Normally, it is very crowded during lunch, especially on Fridays.  Many Winter Texans eat here because it is reasonably priced, variety is good, and it is certified clean.

data.title: cheap and best noodles in edinburg
data.text: this place is really good, it might not be the fanciest but you get what you pay for. Overall really good

data.title: Good food at a good orice
data.text:
We went for an early dinner and the food was pretty good and tasty. 
We have been going there several times per year. It seems to have improved in quality and cleanliness.

data.title: Best Chinese
data.text:
Clean, great service, super food. The staff is friendly and helpful.
The food is prepared in small batches so it is always fresh and hot. Great variety. The best egg drop soup I have tasted

data.title: It's ok
data.text: Went there for lunch. Food was good, love the green beans, not a lot of selection. Would definitely go back.💜

data.title: GREAT!
data.text: Good buffet and friendly staff. They have a great selections of entree and desserts all very affortable.

data.title: Good Fresh Food!
data.text: This Chinese buffet is good and replaced frequently. The staff is welcoming and friendly. The restaurant is clean. The food selection is pretty good.

data.title: Dining at the Golden China in Edinburg.
data.text: A good place to for chinese food. They offer a nice selection in their buffet. Good salad bar and dessert bar too. Staff is very attentive, courteous, and friendly.

data.title: Golden China in Edinburg
data.text: If you are in the mood for Chinese food, stop by the Golden China Restaurant near the town square. The food is fresh and it is good. The meals are buffet style and delicious. The staff is friendly and the service is prompt. We visit often and I recommend it.

data.title: Freshly Made, Delicious Food @ UNBEATABLE Prices!
data.text: I have been frequenting this restaurant for over 10 years for lunch, dinner, and on the weekends.  It is always clean and the staff is friendly.  The entrees are made fresh and replenished throughout the day.  The broccoli is freshly cut and the green beans are hand-snapped daily.  I am usually alone, but also take friends and family there.  The prices are UNBEATABLE... During the week, the lunch buffet is only $7.15 and dinner buffet is only $8.55, and the cost is only $8.55 on the weekends, and this is for as much food as you can eat, including dessert (drinks are extra).  They also have a full menu and you can get TO GO plates, which are also reasonably priced; $7.something for up to 2 lbs. (and if you get mostly shrimp to go, it is a more per lb.)  They are open EVERY day and the owners (original and current) are some of the hardest working people that I know!

data.title: Great Taste, Fantastic Choices & Great Value
data.text: They have a very large selection of various very good food.  We were with a group of about 50 people.  Everyone commented about how good the food tasted.

data.title: Great basic chinese food
data.text: My sister and I have been going to this restaurant for years. The best thing about it is that it is very clean. It has won several cleanliness awards by the local tv station. The food is basic, hot and good.  It is run by this hard working, serious but nice chinese couple.  One time i saw her cut the end of green beans by hand one at a time, getting them ready to be cooked!  It is a buffette kind of deal. Ice cream is also included.  It is a consistent restaurant. The food is always good. I like that.
